wheelsFX.users.Shapes

Class ShapeGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • wheelsFX.users.Shapes.ShapeGroup

  • public class ShapeGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    ShapeGroup.java: Groups shapes together so they can be manipulated as a single entity

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShapeGroup()
      default constructor initiates the shape and line array list
